SELECT i.icon_name, i.image, CASE m.gender WHEN '남' THEN 'MALE' WHEN '여' THEN 'FEMALE' ELSE 'UNKNOWN' END AS gender, COUNT(b.buy_idx) AS purchase_count, ROUND(COUNT(b.buy_idx) / (SELECT COUNT(buy_idx) FROM icon_buy b JOIN member m ON b.id = m.id WHERE m.birth BETWEEN #{startAge} AND #{endAge}) * 100, 2) AS sales_percentage FROM icon i JOIN icon_buy b ON i.icon_idx = b.icon_idx JOIN member m ON b.id = m.id WHERE m.birth BETWEEN #{startAge} AND #{endAge} GROUP BY i.icon_name, i.image, gender ORDER BY icon_idx DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
